projects.title: Daily Spin Bot
projects.description: I created a program to automate SNAI Daily Spin and maximize the reward. The .exe is available at the link below.

projects.title: Words Generator
projects.description: I trained a collection of neural networks on different corpora of existing words to make them capable of generating novel, non-existent words possessing a striking resemblance to real ones. I deployed the final model as a user-interactive and free-access web-app.

projects.title: F1 Race Analysis
projects.tags: Python, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Mining
projects.description: I created a web app to display some statistics and insights from the first ever to the most recent Formula 1 Grand Prix, automatically updated after each race.

projects.title: House Price Predictor
projects.tags: Python, Random Forest Regressor, Neural Network, Linear Regression
projects.description: I developed, trained and tested three different machine learning models to predict the price of several houses in Milan, Rome and Venice (45k +). I then developed a user-interactive and free-access web app to deploy the best performing model.

projects.title: Production Function Estimation
projects.tags: R, Panel Data Analysis, FE/RE Model
projects.description: My group and I applied Panel Data Analysis tools, such as the Fixed Effect (FE) and Random Effect (RE) models to identify individual and time specific latent heterogeneity and provide a statistically relevant estimation of the production function of a firm.

projects.title: Taylor Rule Estimation by OLS
projects.description: My group and I estimated Austria’s interest rate through the application of Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) regression and the insights provided by Taylor’s rule. We retrieved the data related to the macroeconomics indicators needed and successfully estimated the target variable, carefully performing essential diagnostic checks on the obtained results to ensure robustness and accuracy.
